column1: Local Foods////Third time (and this is the third time in a month! ) I got the duck confit with the cabbage salad and kale sides. The sandwich was on toasted wheat sandwich style bread with the duck
column4: and greens. There was also a mayo type sauce. I personally like the combination of sweet and savory
column5: and especially the flavors of brie and jam together
column6: so this meal was a hit for me. The cabbage salad and kale were very good- cabbage was Â fresh and crunchy and the kale was also fresh.
